timeline.bodyText: You don't need to insert all fields, just the required ones (entity_num, entity_realm, entity_shared, fk_entity_type_id). Id is auto generated. This keeps it from being too coupled.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: Good point. I left out a few but I can drop more.
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText: These two can be combined with an INSERT ... ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: Will do. Will also add a createNewTopic to utilize other logic
replies.author: Nana-EC
